title: Libra and Taurus Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: Libra and Taurus can be compatible, but they’ll need to put in a lot of effort.
steps.content: Libra and Taurus can be compatible, but they’ll need to put in a lot of effort. Even though they’re both ruled by Venus, this isn’t a traditional pairing. [1] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Taurus expresses love through lots of physical affection and a deep one-on-one connection, while Libra craves beautiful surroundings in order to feel intimate. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Socially, Taurus keeps to themselves, while Libra is the life of the party. Taurus can become easily insecure, while Libra can become restless from Taurus’ need for reassurance. For a long-lasting relationship , they must acknowledge they have different needs and commit to the right compromises.

steps.title: Both signs are intensely sensual—they’ll just need to feed each other’s desires.
steps.content: Both signs are intensely sensual—they’ll just need to feed each other’s desires. Taurus focuses on the joys of a physical connection when they’re both dressed down. The earth sign craves tenderness and plenty of caresses. Libra, however, wants a bit of spectacle. The air sign won’t be satisfied unless the atmosphere’s right and Taurus tantalizes all five of their senses. Together, they’ll create an exciting dynamic and unforgettable nights. In this situation, these signs can’t count on intuition. Their concepts of passion are so different that they’ll have to discuss exactly how to please each other.

steps.title: Date nights are nourishing and magical with Libra and Taurus.
steps.content: Date nights are nourishing and magical with Libra and Taurus. Both signs want to feel grounded and present, so they each stress the importance of creating a romantic moment. Libra and Taurus are each influenced by Venus. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist [v162044_b01] 23 December 2021. However, Libra desires some extravagance and Taurus simply wants extra time with their partner. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If Libra can plan the outings and Taurus just tags along, these two can truly enjoy themselves. Taurus will have to compromise when it comes to outdoorsy activities—“glamping,” or glamorous camping, or a rustic restaurant will charm a Libra, but they’ll turn their nose up at four wheeling or fishing. Virgo will need to focus on creature comforts—a Taurus can handle an upscale gala or a gallery opening, but it’s best if there are refreshments, like decadent cheese and wine. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Both Libra and Taurus crave love, but their fairy tales can differ.
steps.content: Both Libra and Taurus crave love, but their fairy tales can differ. Venus, a planet that rules over passion and romantic values, drives both of them to picture their “happily ever after.” Taurus has a grand vision of a lover who will dote on them and provide plenty of affection. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. On the other hand, Libra is more practical—they expect a financially stable and mature partnership. These two will need to communicate clearly about their ideal future to know they’re on the same page. If Taurus speaks up about the value of physical touch as a “love language,” then Libra is more likely to take it seriously as a routine form of care. When Libra discusses how much a balanced domestic life will nourish them, Taurus will step back and let their partner handle household affairs.

steps.title: Taurus provides the stability that the airy Libra desperately seeks.
steps.content: Taurus provides the stability that the airy Libra desperately seeks. As an earth sign that prides themselves on being reliable, Taurus can be Libra’s “rock.” While Libra goes where the winds take them and is whisked away on adventures, they want a lover to return to. Taurus is glad to provide that opportunity to Libra. They’ll both appreciate that the other partner cherishes a lasting relationship as much as they do. If Libra makes sure to say how much they appreciate Taurus’ loyalty, then Taurus will enjoy when Libra follows their passions—the earth sign will know that their lover is bound to come back.

steps.title: Taurus and Libra both worry about making the first move, creating a standstill.
steps.content: Taurus and Libra both worry about making the first move, creating a standstill. [7] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Both signs adore the feeling of being wanted. This creates a bit of a challenge since each of them wait in place in hopes that the other will make a grand gesture. If neither of them are willing to step outside their comfort zone and woo the other partner, the chemistry might fizzle out. Luckily, Venus is likely to give one of them a spark of inspiration. Taurus is extremely ambitious, so once they decide to pursue a Libra, they’ll push themselves to chase the air sign. Libra gets carried away by fantasies when they have a crush. If they follow a cue from a daydream, like drawing Taurus into a warm embrace, their spontaneity will pay off.

steps.title: Libra and Taurus express love through acts of service, so they’ll feel well cared for.
steps.content: Libra and Taurus express love through acts of service, so they’ll feel well cared for. Libra is one of the greatest humanitarians in the zodiac, so looking for ways to help out is second nature. Taurus is a lot more introverted and focuses on how to dote on everyone in their inner circle. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. These signs will make each other the center of their universe and find unique ways to express their affection, like performing chores when their lover is tired. Both signs are inspired by Venus and pay attention to detail, so they’ll notice when a partner needs some extra help. For example, they’ll remember a simple comment like, “I wish I was more handy and could fix things around the house.”

steps.title: Libra’s a wildly charismatic flirt, which tests Taurus’ self-esteem.
steps.content: Libra’s a wildly charismatic flirt, which tests Taurus’ self-esteem. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Libra doesn’t actually want to create a shaky foundation for the relationship—all this air sign wants is to float from person to person and be the life of the party. As Taurus watches Libra’s breezy personality, the earth sign worries that their lover will slip away. Libra will need to reassure Taurus that they have strong boundaries and won’t let the tender-hearted Bull down. Libra should explain that justice matters to them and they only network so much to expand their influence. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist [v162044_b01] 23 December 2021. Taurus should use their trademark bravery to ask Libra what makes them different from the air sign’s friends. Libra will be able to use their way with words to calm Taurus’ anxieties.

steps.title: Libra likes to weigh their options before committing, which can rile Taurus up.
steps.content: Libra likes to weigh their options before committing, which can rile Taurus up. It isn’t that Libra wants to leave Taurus wondering about their place in the air sign’s life, it’s just that Libra swears by sincerity. They’ll deliberate for a long time and put off talks about whether they see Taurus as a spouse or a soulmate in the future. Taurus, who only dates in order to build a partnership, can get frustrated by Libra’s indecisiveness. Libra and Taurus can patch up this conflict if Libra simply says that they’ll only bring up exclusivity or marriage when they’re ready. Taurus will at least respect Libra’s honesty.

steps.title: Tension arises as Taurus is infamously stubborn and Libra loves to change their mind.
steps.content: Tension arises as Taurus is infamously stubborn and Libra loves to change their mind. As a fixed sign, earthy Taurus gets stuck on one idea and wants to see it through. [11] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Libra’s a cardinal sign, so they’re driven to lead others—naturally, this means Libra needs to consider the perspective of everyone they meet. For Taurus and Libra to get along in the long-term, they’ll have to celebrate that they’ll always have a unique take on life. Taurus can rely on Libra’s social graces. Since Libra’s such an amazing diplomat, they’ll make parties and family reunions a lot easier to navigate. Libra can learn to take a stand from Taurus. With the Bull’s encouragement, Libra can bring up what they actually disagree with.

steps.title: These two are open to feedback and prioritize making the right compromises.
steps.content: These two are open to feedback and prioritize making the right compromises. While a Taurus usually has their mind made up, they’re absolutely certain they want to make the changes necessary to protect their relationship. As a cardinal sign , Libra can quickly come up with solutions that Taurus wouldn’t have considered. Each will celebrate the other’s commitment to finding strategies to make everything sustainable. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. It’s actually promising that Taurus is a fixed sign here—once they hear Libra’s outlook, the determined Bull will stick to routines, like providing space, that will keep the dynamic healthy. Reader Poll: We asked 752 wikiHow readers and 60% agreed that a successful relationship with an Libra relies on honest communication and understanding. [Take Poll] If a Libra and Taurus can communicate openly and understand each others' perspectives, they're likely to find success in their relationship.

steps.title: When these two lean into their differences, they'll agree that their chemistry is incredible.
steps.content: When these two lean into their differences, they'll agree that their chemistry is incredible. Taurus offers both a fun challenge and an intriguing reward to Libra since the Bull really takes their time with a love connection. Libra prefers to go where the winds will take them, giving into quick passion and jumping into spontaneous declarations of love. Taurus’ patience will drive Libra wild, and Libra’s initiative will dazzle Taurus. [13] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. If they both admit they have different approaches to romance and acknowledge that they bring their own special magic to the relationship, they’ll enjoy delicious tension for years to come.
